code: import*as user from'../actions/user';const InitialState={user:undefined,error:undefined,loading:false};export default(function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:InitialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case user.GET_USER_REQUEST:case user.SET_USER_REQUEST:return{...state,loading:true};case user.GET_USER_SUCCESS:case user.SET_USER_SUCCESS:return{...state,user:action.payload,loading:false,error:undefined};case user.GET_USER_FAILURE:case user.SET_USER_FAILURE:return{...state,error:action.payload,loading:false};default:return state;}});
